text: Mopa atumparegama nemaniza vahe'mo'za ruzahu ruzahu kaguva zantamima erifore'ma hana zankura, ama zana, naza fore nehie hu'za nehu'za, tusi zamagogogu nehaze. Zage hanati kazigati vuno zage fre kazigama umani emanima nehaza vahe'mo'za Kagrama hana kavukvamo zamagu'a zamazeri otige'za tusi muse nehaze.
